Class List Here are the classes, structs, unions and interfaces with brief descriptions:Card
Represents a single playing card in a standard deck Dealer
Dealer class Implements dealer-specific logic and display Deck< T >
Template class representing a deck of cards Game
Main controller class implementing Blackjack game logic GameRes
Represents the result of a single game Stores win/loss status and amount won/lost Human
Human player class Implements interactive player decisions Player
Abstract base class for blackjack players Defines common functionality for managing hands, bets, funds and statistics PStats
Player statistics manager Tracks game results and calculates statistics Save
Structure containing saveable game state data SaveGame
Static class for managing game state persistence Stats
Simple structure holding game statistics
